amendment.description: Add at the end of the bill the following: SEC. 4. RULE OF CONSTRUCTION. Nothing in this bill shall be construed to apply to guidance issued by the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection that is not primarily related to indirect auto financing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in House Report 114-340 to clarify that nothing in the bill shall be construed to apply to guidance issued by the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection that is not primarily related to indirect auto financing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sewell (AL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sewell (AL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Sewell (AL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
